thread.title: Fmr. Wizards coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer
thread.title_full: Fmr. Wizards coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer

title: Fmr. Wizards coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Fmr. Wizards coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer Flip Saunders, the longtime NBA coach who won more than 650 games in nearly two decades and was trying to rebuild the Minnesota Timberwolves as team president, coach and part owner, died Sunday. Post to Facebook Fmr. Wizards coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer Flip Saunders, the longtime NBA coach who won more than 650 games in nearly two decades and was trying to rebuild the Minnesota Timberwolves as team president, coach and part owner, died Sunday.  //on.wusa9.com/1S4uA5j   1   Fmr. Wizards coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer Associated Press, AP 2:57 p.m. EDT October 25, 2015 Flip Saunders 211 CONNECT 13 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
MINNEAPOLIS (AP/WUSA) - Flip Saunders, the longtime NBA coach who won more than 650 games in nearly two decades and was trying to rebuild the Minnesota Timberwolves as team president, coach and part owner, died Sunday, the team said. He was 60. My condolences to the Saunders and @Timberwolves family! Lost a great person in our fraternity way to early. So sad #RIPFlip — LeBron James (@KingJames) October 25, 2015 
Saunders was diagnosed with Hodgkins lymphoma in June and doctors called it "treatable and curable" when the Minnesota Timberwolves made the diagnosis public in August. He took a leave of absence from the team in September after complications arose during his recovery. The sting of losing another loved one to cancer doesn't get any easier. My thoughts & prayers are… https://t.co/ceIKNIriFD — John Wall (@JohnWall) October 25, 2015 
Saunders went 654-592 in 17 seasons with the Timberwolves, Detroit Pistons and Washington Wizards. 
Sam Mitchell has been named interim head coach of the Timberwolves and GM Milt Newton is heading the team's personnel department.
